statements: ALTER TABLE geospatial_data ADD COLUMN new_column INT
ALTER TABLE geospatial_data DROP COLUMN value
ALTER TABLE geospatial_data MODIFY COLUMN location GEOMETRY
ALTER TABLE locations ADD COLUMN region_code VARCHAR(10)
ALTER TABLE spatial_data MODIFY COLUMN data_value DOUBLE
ALTER TABLE locations DROP COLUMN latitude
ALTER TABLE locations DROP COLUMN zip_code;
ALTER TABLE users ADD COLUMN phone_number STRING;
ALTER TABLE geo_analysis ALTER COLUMN area_covered TYPE GEOGRAPHY(Point);
ALTER TABLE regions ADD COLUMN population INT;
ALTER TABLE customers DROP COLUMN email;
ALTER TABLE sales ADD COLUMN product_id INT REFERENCES products(product_id);
ALTER TABLE locations ADD COLUMN description TEXT
ALTER TABLE points_of_interest ADD COLUMN category VARCHAR(50)
ALTER TABLE routes DROP COLUMN route_name
